summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3183 for the improvement of Empire Way, from Rainier Avenue to Renton Avenue at Holden Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 39145, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
